item.title: 马里手工金矿坍塌后打捞出 49 具尸体
item.description: 据当地环境保护协会瓦萨顿（Wassaton）主席阿利乌-迪亚洛（Aliou Diallo）称，马里救援人员已从周六在该国西部坍塌的一个手工金矿中打捞出49具尸体。【原文：Mali rescue workers have retrieved 49 bodies from an artisanal gold mine that collapsed in the country’s west on Saturday, according to Aliou Diallo, president of the local environmental protection association Wassaton.】

item.title: 冬季风暴导致肯塔基州断电并引发洪水
item.description: 一场巨大的冬季风暴给肯塔基州和田纳西州带来了毁灭性的洪灾，全美数百架航班停飞，南方 50 多万用户断电。【原文：A huge winter storm brought devastating flooding to Kentucky and Tennessee, grounded hundreds of flights across the US and knocked out power to more than half a million customers in the South.】

item.title: 美达准备让特朗普参与对抗欧盟规则的斗争
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司的全球政策主管表示，如果欧盟利用其数字规则针对 Meta 的产品，这家技术巨头 "不会回避 "向唐纳德-特朗普总统提起诉讼。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s global policy director said the technology giant “won’t shy away” from taking up its case with President Donald Trump if the European Union uses its digital rules to target Meta’s products.】

item.title: 马拉维通胀回升，消费价格上涨 28.5%
item.description: 马拉维的通货膨胀率在 1 月份有所上升，因为这个非洲南部国家仍在应对厄尔尼诺引发的干旱所带来的粮食不安全问题。【原文：Malawi’s inflation rate increased in January as it continues to cope with food insecurity brought on by the El Nino-induced drought in the southern African nation.】

item.title: 超级碗广告彰显家庭冷咖啡日益增长的热潮
item.description: 在上周日的 "超级碗 "上，达能公司的广告片中，查宁-塔图姆（Channing Tatum）将一大瓶 STōK Cold Brew Coffee 扔给英国足球运动员。雀巢公司（Nestlé SA）的广告则展示了一位观赛者在家中饮用专为冷饮设计的 Coffee-Mate 产品。【原文：At the Super Bowl last Sunday, Danone SA’s commercial featured Channing Tatum tossing a large bottle of STōK Cold Brew Coffee to British soccer players. Nestlé SA’s showcased a game watcher at home consuming a Coffee-Mate product specifically designed for cold drinks.】

item.title: 库尔德地区领导人称伊拉克库尔德斯坦石油出口可能在 3 月恢复
item.description: 伊拉克半自治的库尔德斯坦地区总统发出信号，表示可能在下个月恢复石油出口，这一最新的乐观迹象表明，造成该国约 190 亿美元收入损失的近两年的停产可能很快就会结束。【原文：The president of Iraq’s semi-autonomous Kurdistan region signaled the likely resumption of oil exports next month, the latest optimism that an almost two-year shutdown that cost the nation some $19 billion in lost revenue could soon be over.】

item.title: 苹果和 Meta 将就仿人机器人展开争夺战
item.description: 苹果公司和 Meta 公司将在另一个新兴领域针锋相对：人工智能驱动的仿人机器人。此外：苹果公司正在加紧开发新的 Mac 外置显示屏，首次考虑将其地图应用程序货币化，并争分夺秒地将人工智能功能引入中国。在其他产品新闻方面，该公司在新 Siri 上遇到了一些障碍，为安卓手机发布了 TV+ 应用程序，并准备对 Vision Pro 软件进行重大更新。【原文：Apple and Meta are set to go toe-to-toe in another emerging area: AI-powered humanoid robots. Also: Apple ramps up development of a new external Mac display, ponders monetizing its maps app for the first time and is racing to bring AI features to China. In other product news, the company is hitting snags with the new Siri, releasing a TV+ app for Android phones and preparing a major Vision Pro software update.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税是个谜，所以投资者继续购买股票
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普总统上个月上台承诺对地缘政治盟友和竞争对手全面征收关税以来，华尔街一直在猜测 "他会还是不会"。虽然股市最初的反应是谨慎，但随着政府政策变得越来越混乱，拖延和排除与好战言论混杂在一起，市场情绪正在发生变化。【原文：Wall Street has been guessing “will he or won’t he” on tariffs since President Donald Trump took office last month promising sweeping levies on geopolitical allies and rivals alike. While the initial reaction in the stock market was caution, the mood is shifting as the administration’s policies become increasingly muddled with delays and exclusions mixing with bellicose rhetoric.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司风险分支投资西班牙电信支持的人工智能初创公司
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）的风险投资部门投资了一家由西班牙电信巨头西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）支持的人工智能云初创企业，以推动沙特王国成为人工智能中心。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s venture arm has invested in an AI cloud startup backed by Spanish telecom giant Telefonica SA as it seeks to drive the kingdom’s push to become an artificial intelligence hub.】

item.title: 卡拉汉称土耳其采取 "渐进式 "降息措施
item.description: 土耳其央行在周日的评论中加倍强调了其对降息的谨慎态度，并表示面对全球风险加剧市场不确定性的情况，该行随时准备采取行动。【原文：Turkey’s central bank doubled down on its cautious approach to cutting interest rates in comments on Sunday and said it stands ready to act in the face of global risks adding to uncertainty in the market.】

item.title: 美元远期升值为亚洲各国央行带来风险
item.description: 亚洲各国央行正越来越多地利用衍生品来保护本国货币免受强势美元的冲击，这引发了人们的疑问：它们能这样做多久，以及它们是否只是在为未来埋下隐患。【原文：Central banks across Asia are increasingly using derivatives to protect their currencies against a strong dollar, raising questions over how long they can do so and whether they are just storing up trouble for the future.】

item.title: 股市多头面临德国大选引发下跌的梦游风险
item.description: 欧洲股票市场的定价是，高风险的德国联邦大选将出现近乎完美的结果。对一些投资者来说，这就增加了令人不快的风险。【原文：Europe’s equity markets are priced for a near-perfect outcome from the high-stakes German federal election. For some investors, that raises the risk of a nasty surprise.】

item.title: 中国人民银行潘功胜表示物价增长和消费需求 "可以更强劲
item.description: 中国央行行长潘功胜表示，在经济稳健、地方政府债务和房地产市场风险降低的情况下，中国的物价增长和消费需求 "可以更加强劲"。【原文：China’s price growth and consumer demand “can be stronger” amid a sound economy and reduced risks from local government debt and the property market, central bank Governor Pan Gongsheng said.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 机构放眼利雅得以外地区，推动旅游业发展
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金旗下的一家旅游投资初创公司正在沙特阿拉伯王国的二线城市规划新的酒店和娱乐项目，以进一步实现该国成为世界上游客最多的旅游目的地之一的目标。【原文：A tourism investment startup of Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is planning new hotel and entertainment projects in tier-two cities across the kingdom in a bid to further the country’s goal of becoming one of the world’s most visited destinations.】

item.title: 刚果称其士兵在重要城市剿灭了卢旺达支持的叛军
item.description: 据刚果总统费利克斯-齐塞凯迪（Felix Tshisekedi）办公室称，在布卡武市遭到卢旺达支持的叛军入侵一天后，来自刚果民主共和国的士兵于周六返回了该市。【原文：Soldiers from the Democratic Republic of Congo returned to the city of Bukavu Saturday, a day after it was invaded by Rwanda-backed rebels, according to the office of Congolese President Felix Tshisekedi.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 支持的开发商寻求从首次公开募股中获得 5.23 亿美元
item.description: 由沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金支持的 Umm Al Qura for Development & Construction Co.【原文：Umm Al Qura for Development & Construction Co., backed by Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund, is seeking to raise as much as $523 million from an initial public offering in Riyadh.】

item.title: 据《非洲金融报》报道，KKR 对基金管理公司 Perpetual 发起新一轮竞购
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，收购公司 KKR & Co.提高了对澳大利亚基金管理公司 Perpetual Ltd. 财富管理业务的收购报价，而在此之前的两个月，最初的交易因意外的税务裁决而告吹。【原文：Buyout firm KKR & Co. has sweetened its offer for Australian fund manager Perpetual Ltd.’s wealth management business two months after an initial deal was scuppered by an unexpected tax ruling, the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: 英国令人担忧的裁员浪潮并未出现
item.description: 在英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）公布其增税预算案后，一场裁员雪崩的威胁至今仍未出现，人们对大流行病后重新雇佣工人的困难程度的记忆说服了许多公司继续留住员工。【原文：A threatened avalanche of job cuts after Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves unveiled her tax-raising budget has so far failed to materialize, with memories of how difficult it was to rehire workers following the pandemic persuading many firms to hang onto staff instead.】

item.title: 爱尔兰总理称欧盟必须加大创新力度才能与美国竞争
item.description: 爱尔兰总理说，欧盟需要加强创新，减少监管，这样才能在技术方面与美国和中国竞争。【原文：Ireland’s prime minister said the European Union needs to innovate more and regulate less in order for the bloc to compete with the US and China on technology.】

item.title: 马斯克称 xAI 的 Grok 3 聊天机器人将于下周一发布
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在 X 网站上发表文章称，Grok 3 模型将于太平洋时间周一晚上 8 点发布，并进行现场演示。【原文：The Grok 3 model will be released with a live demo at 8 p.m. Pacific time on Monday, Elon Musk says in a post on X.】

item.title: 日本寻求豁免特朗普的互惠贸易关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普计划今年对日本征收所谓的互惠关税，日本已要求免于征收，因为这个亚洲国家正努力将任何潜在的影响降到最低。【原文：Japan has asked to be exempted from the so-called reciprocal tariffs that Donald Trump plans to adopt this year as the Asian nation works to minimize any potential fallout.】

item.title: Broadcom 考虑收购英特尔芯片设计部门：华尔街日报
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，博通公司（Broadcom Inc.【原文：Broadcom Inc. has had informal talks with its advisers about making a bid for Intel Corp.’s chip-design and marketing business, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁加征关税后，英国发布 25 亿英镑钢铁计划
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对从所有国家进口的钢铁和铝征收 25% 关税的几天后，英国政府首次推出了一项保护本国钢铁行业就业的新计划。【原文：The UK government debuted a new plan to protect jobs in the country’s steel industry just days after US President Donald Trump threatened to introduce 25% tariffs on imports of steel and aluminum from all countries.】

item.title: 深度搜索推动 13 万亿美元中概股上涨，基金纷纷涌入
item.description: DeepSeek 在人工智能领域的突破正在帮助推动股票基金从印度回流中国。【原文：DeepSeek’s breakthrough in artificial intelligence is helping drive a rotation of stock funds back into China from India.】

item.title: 成本飙升，澳大利亚将禁止外国人购买部分房屋
item.description: 澳大利亚政府将在未来两年内禁止外国投资者购买成套住宅，以此作为应对房价飙升的竞选策略之一。【原文：Australia’s government will ban foreign investors from buying established houses for the next two years as part of an election pitch to tackle surging home prices.】

item.title: 加拿大保守党领袖提出重大自然资源改革方案以对抗特朗普
item.description: 作为应对美国关税威胁的全面计划的一部分，加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利耶夫尔（Pierre Poilievre）承诺建设 "东西经济"，将石油和天然气管道从阿尔伯塔省延伸到海洋省份。【原文：Canadian Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre pledged to build an “east-west economy” with oil and gas pipelines stretching from Alberta to the Maritime provinces as part of a sweeping plan to respond to US tariff threats.】

item.title: 亚马逊北卡罗来纳州仓库工人拒绝工会申请
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）称，北卡罗来纳州一家仓库的工人拒绝接受工会代表，这标志着该公司阻止其蓝领工人组织工会的努力取得了胜利。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. said workers at a warehouse in North Carolina rejected union representation, marking a victory for the company’s efforts to prevent its blue-collar workforce from organizing.】

item.title: 英国通胀回升将使英国央行对降息保持谨慎
item.description: 英国 1 月份的通胀率可能达到了 10 个月以来的最高水平，物价压力继续回升，这使得英国央行对贸然降息持谨慎态度。【原文：UK inflation probably hit its highest level in 10 months in January, continuing a resurgence in price pressures that has made the Bank of England wary over rushing into interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 银行收紧贷款，垃圾债券大师认为未来困境将加剧
item.description: 资深高收益分析师马蒂-弗里德森（Marty Fridson）认为，强劲的美国经济使不良债务投资者缺乏机会，但这种情况可能即将改变。【原文：The strong US economy has left distressed debt investors starved of opportunity but that may be about to change, according to veteran high-yield analyst Marty Fridson.】

item.title: 肖尔茨表示欧盟将反击特朗普关税，但最好能达成协议
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）表示，欧盟有足够的实力应对美国的任何关税威胁，但他希望通过谈判达成协议，避免贸易战。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said the European Union is strong enough to counter any US tariff threats but that he hopes for a negotiated agreement that can avoid a trade war.】
